Code Variations


Inline Code Variations

Simple code inline.
Code with spaces inside here.
Code with special <chars> encoded.

Multiple Inline Code

Use foo() or bar() or baz().

Code At Boundaries

start of line.
End of line end
entire line is code

bold code

Pre Block Simple

function test() {
    return true;
}

Pre Block With Entities

if (x < 10 && y > 5) {
    return x & y;
}

Pre Block With Indentation

class Example:
    def __init__(self):
        self.value = 0

    def increment(self):
        self.value += 1
